steps.name: user opens the Home page as a login user
the user navigates from a main category to a subcategory
the user selects a Sort By option and verifies the sorted product listing
the user checks the pagination functionality on the PLP page
the user clicks on a product and is redirected to the Product Detail Page
User adds multiple item to cart,then,removes items from cart and observes order summary calculation
the user enters shipping and billing address details in checkout page
after entering the address details, the user selects a payment option and places the order

steps.name: the user opens the Home page and do the login
the user selects a category and subcategory option from the Home page
the Product Listing Page is displayed based on the selected category
the user clicks on any one product image based on the applied filter
the user navigates from the Product Detail Page  to the cart page
the user clicks on the checkout button
the user select the shipp addrres  details and   navigated to the Payment Options section
the user Select the payment option and places the order.Then,Verify the order detail in my account page

steps.name: the user opens the Home page as a guest and selects a category to navigate to the Product Listing Page
the user clicks on the quick view of any product from the PLP
on the quick view popup, the user selects the size and quantity for the product
the user clicks the Add to Cart button and is navigated to the Cart page
the user clicks the Checkout button as a guest user
the user completes mobile number verification and observes the page response
the user clicks on the Continue to Payment button and places the order

User Enter the product name in search box "TROUSERS"

name: To be Verify the E2E Functionality in Petit Beteau site
